alert.note: Alert for Russell; Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 4:23AM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Russell and eastern Washington Counties through 500 AM EDT... At 422 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Raccoon to Asberrys. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abingdon, Lebanon, Cleveland Va, Glade Spring, Honaker, Dye, Lindell, Emory-Meadow View, Rosedale and Konnarock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
